text: dreahabud'dhiyalum, satyanisedhattalum, visvasikalkkitayil bhinnatayuntakkan ventiyum mumputanne allahuveatum avanre dutaneatum yud'dham ceytavarkk tavalamuntakkikeatukkuvan ventiyum oru palliyuntakkiyavarum (a kapatanmarute kuttattiluntâ€Œ). nannal nallatallate onnum uddesiccittilla enn avar anayitt parayukayum ceyyum. tirccayayum avar kallam parayunnavar tanneyan ennatin allahu saksyam vahikkunnu
